dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT VENDOR_NAME, VENDOR_ID, VENDOR_SITE_CODE, SUPPLIER_SITE_CATEGORY, VENDOR_ASSISTANT VENDOR_ASSISTANT_NAME, PO_CURRENCY CURRENCY_CODE, SUM(BUC_D_0) BUC_S_0, SUM(BUC_D_1) BUC_S_1, SUM(BUC_D_2) BUC_S_2, SUM(BUC_D_3) BUC_S_3, SUM(BUC_D_4) BUC_S_4, SUM(BUC_D_5) BUC_S_5, SUM(BUC_D_6) BUC_S_6, SUM(BUC_D_7) BUC_S_7 FROM (SELECT PO_NUMBER , PO_CURRENCY , C_LOCATION , RECEIPT_NUM , SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID, RECEIPT_DATE , VENDOR_ID , VENDOR_NAME , VENDOR_SITE_CODE , SUPPLIER_SITE_CATEGORY , VENDOR_ASSISTANT , BUC_D_0 , BUC_D_1 , BUC_D_2 , BUC_D_3 , BUC_D_4 , BUC_D_5 , BUC_D_6 , BUC_D_7 FROM TABLE (XX_AP_XXAUNMATCHRECEIPT_PKG.xx_ap_unmatch_detail( :p_date , :p_segment_from , :p_segment_to , :p_sup_site_cd_from , :p_sup_site_cd_to , :p_currency_Code ))) GROUP BY VENDOR_NAME, VENDOR_ID, VENDOR_SITE_CODE, SUPPLIER_SITE_CATEGORY, VENDOR_ASSISTANT, PO_CURRENCY ORDER BY VENDOR_NAME, VENDOR_SITE_CODE
